title: How do i escape bronze?
body: When i started ranked i was placed in Silver V and eventually dropped to B2 and wondered how i could drop so fast.I then got into promos for B1 and everybody trolled 2nd game twitch up and third leona top who went afk.I'm wondering whether i can escape or would i have to tart and new account and try again.Wondering if anyone know how i can escape and what champ are particularly good.Feel free to check my OP.GG for stats.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: Play Garen AP mid and you will be Iron in no time
Lol, no but seriously is there a certain champ that i could use?

Vladimir with Dark Seal and Ghost would be my pick

Or go Leblanc and play aggressively with a kill lane then roam approach

Nasus can 1 vs 2/3 (farm to 130-150 stack, then keep fighting when ennemy jg shows elsewhere for easy kills)
